Title: Requires liability insurance for bicycles, bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters in cities having a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires liability insurance for bicycles, bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters in cities having a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring liability insurance for bicycles, bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters in cities having a population of one million or more
